jobDescription: As a Senior Integration Scientist at Illumina you will work in a dynamic, team-oriented environment and help create genomic analysis  tools used in the leading edge of research. You will participate in the development of high quality, robust products through the integration of  hardware, software, and chemistry components. You will execute test plans in order to optimize product performance.
